org.flexiblepower.efi.util

Class Transition.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.flexiblepower.efi.util.Transition.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    Transition

    public static class Transition.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
    This helper class should be used to easily define a Transition. Use the Transition.create(int) or Transition#create(RunningMode)) method to get a new instance of this class.

        public Transition build()
